channel.title: •omg epic error!•
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: jar/jar Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: jar.jar at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .
I used some compiler to make a .jar file out of my server cause I wanted to see what it would do. Turns out, i get the above error when I try to use vista restarter or any restarter for example...
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 26, 2008, 01:57:59 pm[/size][hr]Fixed.

item.title: •omg epic error!•
item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: jar/jar
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: jar.jar
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)
Press any key to continue . . .

I used some compiler to make a .jar file out of my server cause I wanted to see what it would do. Turns out, i get the above error when I try to use vista restarter or any restarter for example…

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 26, 2008, 01:57:59 pm[/size][hr]Fixed.
